Mermaid Vomit.definition: Trend where it is [fashionable] to suspend pieces of shells, rocks, and sand in resin, often made into decorative pieces. The result looks like regurgitated mermaid vomit. The term "mermaid vomit" came into [popularity] on a thrift store Facebook page after [disagreements] on whether mermaid vomit was the same defined by "Vomit clock" Any object made this way can be called "mermaid vomit."
Mermaid Vomit.example: "Bea! [Check out] this [Mermaid] Vomit lamp ! Won't this go great in [the bathroom]??"
